title: Beef burger
content:
Burger is easy and comforting dish. The variation of burger toppings is endless. Here I present my favourite version.

Ingredients:

  • Burger buns
  • Beef patty
  • Cheddar
  • Sauce (mayo, BBQ sauce, mustard)
  • Thinly sliced red onion
  • Tomato, rucolla, dill pickles

Making instructions:

  1. Fry the patty , put on cheddar to melt 
  2. Mix the sauce ingredients
  3. Toast the buns
  4. Assemble burger: put on veggies, patty, sauce
